GSD.product_version: versions from v3.1 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
net/x25: Fix skb leak in x25_lapb_receive_frame()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit 9f00da9c866d506998bf0a3f699ec900730472da, it was introduced in version v3.1 by commit cb101ed2c3c7c0224d16953fe77bfb9d6c2cb9df. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/x25: Fix skb leak in x25_lapb_receive_frame()
